Class GoogleDrive

java.lang.Object
  apis.GoogleDrive

public class GoogleDrive
extends java.lang.Object

A Class to access the google drive api. Some code snippets were taken from code samples provided by Google

Parameters:
emailAddress - User's e-mail address.

Returns:
Authorization URL to redirect the user to.
Throws:

getCredentials

private static com.google.api.client.auth.oauth2.Credential getCredentials(java.lang.String authorizationCode,
                                                                           java.lang.String state)
                                                                    throws GoogleDrive.CodeExchangeException,
                                                                           GoogleDrive.NoRefreshTokenException,
                                                                           java.io.IOException
Retrieve credentials using the provided authorization code. This function exchanges the authorization code for an access token and queries the UserInfo API to retrieve the user's e-mail address. If a refresh token has been retrieved along with an access token, it is stored in the application database using the user's e-mail address as key. If no refresh token has been retrieved, the function checks in the application database for one and returns it if found or throws a NoRefreshTokenException with the authorization URL to redirect the user to.

Parameters:
authorizationCode - Authorization code to use to retrieve an access token.
state - State to set to the authorization URL in case of error.
Returns:
OAuth 2.0 credentials instance containing an access and refresh token.
Throws:
GoogleDrive.NoRefreshTokenException - No refresh token could be retrieved from the available sources.
java.io.IOException - Unable to load client_secrets.json.
GoogleDrive.CodeExchangeException
